meanings.sent1: The precertifying process ensured everything was ready before the event.
meanings.sent2: The precertifying documents were completed ahead of time.
meanings.sent3: The precertifying paperwork was so organized, it almost seemed magical.
meanings.sent4: Her precertifying skills were like having a crystal ball predicting the future.
meanings.sent5: The importance of precertifying became clear when the deadline approached.

meanings.definition: To authorize or approve in advance.
meanings.sent1: They were precertifying the new software to avoid delays.
meanings.sent2: The company was precertifying the project to ensure smooth progress.
meanings.sent3: He precertified the plan with a stamp of approval and a smile.
meanings.sent4: Precertifying the budget was like giving it a golden ticket to success.
meanings.sent5: The team precertified the proposal, setting the stage for a successful presentation.
